statements: SELECT * FROM investments WHERE company_name = 'Company A'
SELECT id, company_name, shares FROM investments WHERE purchase_price > 1000
SELECT * FROM investments ORDER BY purchase_date DESC
SELECT company_name, symbol, shares, purchase_price FROM investments WHERE shares < 100
SELECT company_name, purchase_price FROM investments WHERE purchase_date > '2021-01-01' AND purchase_date < '2021-12-31' LIMIT 3
SELECT * FROM investments WHERE purchase_price > 1000 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT company_name, SUM(shares) AS total_shares FROM investments GROUP BY company_name HAVING SUM(shares) > 100
SELECT symbol, purchase_price FROM investments WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY purchase_price ASC
SELECT company_name, AVG(purchase_price) AS avg_price FROM investments GROUP BY company_name ORDER BY avg_price DESC
SELECT company_name, MAX(shares) AS max_shares FROM investments GROUP BY company_name HAVING MAX(shares) > 500
SELECT * FROM portfolio;
SELECT portfolio_name, total_investment FROM portfolio;
SELECT * FROM investment_holdings WHERE investment_amount > 10000;
SELECT investment_name, investment_amount FROM investment_holdings ORDER BY investment_amount DESC;
SELECT portfolio_name, investment_name, investment_amount FROM portfolio p JOIN investment_holdings ih ON p.portfolio_id = ih.portfolio_id;
SELECT * FROM portfolio JOIN investment_holdings ON portfolio.portfolio_id = investment_holdings.portfolio_id;
SELECT portfolio_name, total_investment FROM portfolio WHERE total_investment > 10000;
SELECT investment_name, investment_amount FROM investment_holdings ORDER BY investment_amount DESC;
SELECT portfolio_name, SUM(investment_amount) AS total_investment FROM portfolio JOIN investment_holdings ON portfolio.portfolio_id = investment_holdings.portfolio_id GROUP BY portfolio_name;
SELECT * FROM portfolio WHERE portfolio_name LIKE 'Tech%';
SELECT * FROM investment_holdings ORDER BY purchase_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, asset_name, quantity FROM investment_holdings WHERE asset_type = 'Stock' ORDER BY purchase_price ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT asset_name, purchase_price FROM investment_holdings WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY asset_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, purchase_date FROM investment_holdings WHERE purchase_price > 1000 ORDER BY purchase_price DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM client_profile ORDER BY name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM investment_holdings WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT id, asset_name, asset_type, purchase_price FROM investment_holdings WHERE purchase_price > 1000;
SELECT portfolio_id, date, value, return FROM portfolio_performance WHERE date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY value DESC;
SELECT name, email, phone_number FROM client_profile WHERE name LIKE '%Smith%' ORDER BY client_id ASC;
SELECT SUM(quantity), AVG(purchase_price) FROM investment_holdings WHERE asset_type = 'Stock';
SELECT * FROM Portfolio;
SELECT total_value, portfolio_name FROM Portfolio ORDER BY total_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM Investment WHERE investment_type = 'Stocks';
SELECT investment_name, amount_invested FROM Investment WHERE amount_invested > 10000;
SELECT asset_name, asset_type FROM Asset ORDER BY quantity DESC, purchase_price ASC;
SELECT * FROM Portfolio;
SELECT portfolio_name, total_value FROM Portfolio WHERE total_value > 10000;
SELECT investment_name, amount_invested FROM Investment WHERE date_invested BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT Asset.asset_name, Asset.quantity, Transaction.amount FROM Asset JOIN Transaction ON Asset.id = Transaction.asset_id WHERE Transaction.transaction_date = '2022-03-15';

SELECT Portfolio.portfolio_name, Investment.investment_type, Asset.asset_name, Transaction.transaction_type, Transaction.amount FROM Portfolio JOIN Investment JOIN Asset JOIN Transaction ON Portfolio.id = Investment.id AND Investment.id = Asset.id AND Asset.id = Transaction.asset_id;
SELECT * FROM investment_holdings
SELECT symbol, quantity, cost FROM investment_holdings ORDER BY cost DESC
SELECT transaction_date, price, quantity FROM transactions WHERE symbol='AAPL'
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT portfolio_name, created_at FROM portfolios
SELECT * FROM investment_holdings ORDER BY symbol ASC, quantity DESC
SELECT symbol, quantity, cost FROM investment_holdings WHERE cost > 1000 ORDER BY cost DESC
SELECT id, portfolio_name, created_at FROM portfolios
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC
SELECT * FROM performance_history WHERE value > 5000 AND date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY date DESC
